Too OVERRATED!!! I came here after the Picasso museum visit as it was just down the block and highly rated in Yelp.  But I was largely disappointed!   The anchovies were VERY salty and fishy, not fresh at all.   The seafood plate for one qas very very small portion.  The seafood tasted like they were from a can and probably were because Catalans like seafood from can.  I didn't mind as long as they were good but they were not!  Did I mentioned it was tiny?  The beef with green peppers were tough and the beef was completely cooked through unlike some reviews I saw with it cooked medium.  That was the reason I ordered it thinking it'd be medium or medium rare but apparently they were inconsistent.  At 19 euros for fully done beef was way overpriced!  The house cava (sparkling white wine) was overrated.  The ONLY good dish was the grilled calamari which was fresh and the simply garlic olive oil parsley sauce gave it a lot of flavors.  The calamari was the only reason I gave this place 3 star instead of 2!!!
